Swiss Rutin Masuk Daftar Negara Ter-Happy Dunia, Apa Rahasianya?
06 Nov 2019, 12:10 by Johanes Randy Prakoso


Ilustrasi orang Swiss (iStock)

Jakarta - Menurut World Happiness 2019, Swiss adalah negara keenam paling bahagia di dunia. Mungkin ini rahasianya.Setiap tahun, United Nations Sustainable Development Solutions Network selaku lembaga di bawah PBB rutin mengeluarkan daftar negara yang masyarakatnya paling bahagia. Nama negara Swiss menempati peringkat keenam tahun 2019 ini, dengan Finlandia berada di peringkat teratas.Bagi Swiss, peringkat 10 besar di daftar negara paling happy itu pun bukan barang baru. Sebelumnya, Swiss memang cukup sering jadi langganan masuk daftar bergengsi itu.Dalam acara dialog dengan rekan media di The Residence ONFIVE, Hotel Grand Hyatt, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (5/11/2019), pihak Switzerland Tourism pun sempat berbagi cerita soal itu."Kita bicara kualitas hidup, kami tak pernah mengantre di Swiss. Bandingkan dengan di Jakarta," ujar perwakilan Switzerland Tourism yang membawahi pasar Asia Tenggara, Ivan Breiter.


Perwakilan Switzerland Tourism yang membawahi pasar Asia Tenggara, Ivan Breiter (Randy/detikcom)

Selain moda transportasi yang terpadu dan cepat, panorama alam Swiss yang dikeliling oleh pegunungan es hingga sungai nan bersih turut meningkatkan kualitas hidup masyarakatnya."Kita punya sungai bersih dan udara yang bersih serta pemandangan pegunungan. Dalam dua jam dari kota Anda sudah bisa berdiri di atas gunung," ujar Ivan.Ivan pun tak bisa menampik, kalau negaranya punya semua hal yang dicari oleh masyarakat dunia. Namun, kuncinya adalah bagaimana orang di Swiss dapat menikmati hidupnya."Nikmati hidup semaksimal mungkin. Standar hidup yang tinggi membuat masyarakatnya bahagia," tutup Ivan.Berkaca dari Swiss, masyarakatnya memang punya standar tinggi soal kualitas hidup. Akses transportasi yang baik, panorama yang indah serta memang menciptakan work life balance yang berkualitas. Simak Video "Melihat Eloknya Jakarta dari Lensa Kamera"[Gambas:Video 20detik](rdy/krs)

Switzerland Routinely Enters the World's Happiest Country List, What's the Secret?
Nov 6, 2019, 12:10 by Johanes Randy Prakoso


Illustration of Swiss people (iStock)

Jakarta - According to World Happiness 2019, Switzerland is the sixth happiest country in the world. Maybe this is the secret. Every year, the United Nations Sustainable Development Solutions Network as an institution under the United Nations routinely issues a list of countries with the happiest people. The name of the country of Switzerland was ranked sixth in 2019, with Finland ranked at the top. For Switzerland, the top 10 in the list of happiest countries was not new. Previously, Switzerland was quite often subscribed to the prestigious list. In a dialogue event with media partners at The Residence ONFIVE, Grand Hyatt Hotel, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5/2019), the Swiss Tourism also had a chance to share the story about it. "We are talking about quality of life, we never queued in Switzerland. Compare with Jakarta," said the Swiss Tourism representative who oversees the Southeast Asian market, Ivan Breiter.


Representative of Switzerland Tourism in charge of the Southeast Asian market, Ivan Breiter (Randy / detikcom)

In addition to an integrated and fast mode of transportation, Swiss natural panoramas surrounded by ice mountains to clean rivers help improve the quality of life of its people. "We have clean rivers and clean air and mountain views. Within two hours of the city you can stand on mountain, "said Ivan. Ivan cannot refuse, if his country has all the things sought by the world community. However, the key is how people in Switzerland can enjoy their lives. "Enjoy life as much as possible. High living standards make people happy," concluded Ivan. Reading from Switzerland, the people do have high standards about the quality of life. Good transportation access, beautiful panorama and indeed creates a quality work life balance.
